definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: A button has come off my coat.
sentences.chinese: 我的上衣掉了一个扣子。

sentences.english: All right. Let me help you button your shirt.
sentences.chinese: 好，我来帮你扣衬衫扣子。

sentences.english: Mike is sewing a button on his coat.
sentences.chinese: 麦克在给他的大衣钉扣子。

sentences.english: Another one helped to sew the button onto his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 另一个队员帮他把扣子缝在衬衣上。

sentences.english: Chen is full of sweat with heat so that he has to untie the buttons of blue shirt.
sentences.chinese: 陈老师热得满头大汗，索性将蓝色衬衣的扣子解开。

sentences.english: It will only take a moment to replace the shirt button.
sentences.chinese: 更换这件衬衫的扣子只须一下下的时间。

sentences.english: My coat is missing a button , could you sew on the same kind?
sentences.chinese: 我衣服丢了一个扣子，能给钉上一个相同的吗？

sentences.english: On a three-button jacket, you button the middle; the top button is optional.
sentences.chinese: 三个扣子的外套，你扣住中间的，顶上的随意。

sentences.english: Thy coral clasps and amber studs.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚的扣子和琥珀纽的晶彩。

sentences.english: BRASS】He has brass buttons on his jackets.
sentences.chinese: 他的夹克上有黄铜扣子。

sentences.english: Which company are the poppers sourced from?
sentences.chinese: 扣子是来源于哪个公司的？

sentences.english: His figure was enveloped in a riding cloak, fur collared and steel clasped;
sentences.chinese: 他身上裹着骑手披风，戴着皮毛领，系着钢扣子。

sentences.english: Maybe it's a cashmere cardigan without buttons.
sentences.chinese: 也许这会是一件没有扣子的开司米羊毛衫。

sentences.english: When trying it on, always start on the loosest clasp.
sentences.chinese: 试穿的时分，先试最宽松的扣子。

sentences.english: Would you like to unbutton your jacket for checking?
sentences.chinese: 您能解开上衣的扣子让我们检查一下吗？

definition: variant of 紐扣|纽扣[niu3 kou4]
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)
